content: inspired by my favourite flowers this pattern is a relaxing and intuitive knit these socks are worked top down the pattern includes instructions for a heel flap and gusset a modified wedge toe and how to work these in a contrast yarn optional the stitch pattern is worked on the front of the sock and is written and charted **sizes** small medium large finished sock circumference unstretched 18 20 25 23 cm / 7 8 9 inches **skill level** a basic understand of sock construction knitting in the round simple knit and purl stitches increases decreases and how to kitchener stitch this pattern has been tested and tech edited this pattern is for personal use only
